mapper.sql: dealer_id, dealer_name, pwd, true_name as trueName, head_img as head_img, dept_id as deptId, salt, authority_group_id as authorityGroupId, nick_name as nickName, list_order as listOrder, introduce, overall_profit_and_loss, avg_profit_ratio, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state
mapper.insert: insert into t_dealer(dealer_id, dealer_name, pwd, salt, true_name, nick_name, head_img, introduce, overall_profit_and_loss, avg_profit_ratio, list_order, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state) values (#{dealerId}, #{dealerName}, #{pwd}, #{salt}, #{trueName}, #{nickName}, #{headImg}, #{introduce}, #{overallProfitAndLoss}, #{avgProfitRatio}, #{listOrder}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{state})
mapper.update: update t_dealer set pwd = #{pwd}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} where dealer_id = #{dealerId}

update t_dealer set dealer_name = #{dealerName} ,pwd = #{pwd} ,head_img = #{headImg} ,true_name = #{trueName} ,dept_id = #{deptId} ,nick_name = #{nickName} ,introduce = #{introduce} ,overall_profit_and_loss = #{overallProfitAndLoss} ,avg_profit_ratio = #{avgProfitRatio} ,list_order = #{listOrder} ,update_time = #{updateTime} ,update_by = #{updateBy} where dealer_id = #{dealerId}
mapper.select: select from t_dealer where state = #{vo.state} and (dealer_name like #{params.keyword} or true_name like #{params.keyword})
select from t_dealer where state = #{state} and (manager_name like #{keyword} or true_name like #{keyword})
select from t_dealer where dealer_name = #{dealerName} and authority_group_id = #{authorityGroupId} and dealer_id <> #{dealerId} and state = #{state}
mapper.update: update t_dealer set state = #{state}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where dealer_id = #{dealerId}
update t_dealer set state = #{state}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where dealer_id in #{dealerId}
